Derived metric: Percentage of Like Adjacencies

Source: R/metrics_derived.R
mPLA.Rd

Percent of the adjacencies per class that are like adjacencies.

mPLA

Format

A list of 3 elements:

g_ii

like adjacencies based on doble count: list(operator = "mAdjacency")

g_ik

sum of paired adjacencies based on double count: list(operator = "mAdjacency", type = "pairedSum")

equation

"(g_ii / g_ik) * 100"

Contents

  • Format
